name: YobiDrive Link File
summary: Learn about .YBD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When double-clicked, YBD files are opened by YobiExplorer, the desktop application that allows users to browse YobiDrives.

YobiDrive supports encrypted storage as well as password protection and other authentication mechanisms. The service enables users to securely share files with other users, which is useful for personal and business purposes.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
